Transmit multichannel partition mode bit. XMCME operates in conjunction with RMCME. The RMCME and XMCME bit values need to be the same. RMCME XMCME Operation Mode 0 0 32 channel normal operation mode 1 1 128 channel normal operation mode 0 1 Reserved 1 0 Reserved

bitenum.description: 2-Partition Multi Channel Mode

Transmit partition A block bits
